mapper.update:
update O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER_DETAIL
TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ID = #{terminalTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN_BEGIN_NUM = #{snBeginNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN_END_NUM = #{snEndNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_COM = #{proCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_MODEL = #{proModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_ORG_ID = #{originalOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_ORG_NAME = #{originalOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_BUS_ID = #{originalBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOAL_ORG_ID = #{goalOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOAL_ORG_NAME = #{goalOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOAL_BUS_ID = #{goalBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST_TIME = #{adjustTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SN_COUNT = #{snCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUTT_JOINT_PERSON = #{buttJointPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST_STATUS = #{adjustStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_NUM = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUS_ID = #{busId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER_DETAIL set TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ID = #{terminalTransferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_BEGIN_NUM = #{snBeginNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_END_NUM = #{snEndNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_COM = #{proCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_MODEL = #{proModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORG_ID = #{originalOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORG_NAME = #{originalOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_BUS_ID = #{originalBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOAL_ORG_ID = #{goalOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOAL_ORG_NAME = #{goalOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOAL_BUS_ID = #{goalBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST_TIME = #{adjustTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SN_COUNT = #{snCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUTT_JOINT_PERSON = #{buttJointPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST_STATUS = #{adjustStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_NUM = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUS_ID = #{busId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select t.*,a.ag_name,u.name as BUTT_JOINT_PERSON_NAME,cu.name as C_USER_NAME,uu.name as U_USER_NAME from o_terminal_transfer_detail t left join a_agent a on t.agent_id = a.id left join c_user u on t.butt_joint_person = u.id left join c_user cu on t.c_user = cu.id left join c_user uu on t.u_user = uu.id
order by t.c_time desc

select t.*,a.ag_name,u.name as BUTT_JOINT_PERSON_NAME,cu.name as C_USER_NAME,uu.name as U_USER_NAME from o_terminal_transfer_detail t left join a_agent a on t.agent_id = a.id left join c_user u on t.butt_joint_person = u.id left join c_user cu on t.c_user = cu.id left join c_user uu on t.u_user = uu.id
order by t.c_time desc
select count(*) from o_terminal_transfer_detail t left join a_agent a on t.agent_id = a.id
mapper.update: update O_TERMINAL_TRANSFER_DETAIL set STATUS = 0 where TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ID = #{map.terminalTransferId}
